channel.title: Admin on RPN Knowledge Base
channel.description: Recent content in Admin on RPN Knowledge Base

item.title: Digital Media Reporting (Part 1 - Website Analytics)
item.description: Let’s get you started on the how to view, analyze, and report the website. This is not a tutorial how to use Excel or Word

item.title: Digital Media Reporting (Part 2 - Website Posts)
item.description: This is the Part 2 of Digital Media Reporting. Login to WordPress Admin Panel Navigate and login to the RPN WordPress admin panel.

item.title: Digital Media Reporting (Part 3 - Audio Streaming)
item.description: This is the Part 3 of Digital Media Reporting. Login to CentovaCast Admin Panel Navigate and login to http://88.198.70.25/login/index.php. Reporting You should now be seeing the Accounts List on Account Management

item.title: Digital Media Reporting (Part 4 - Social Media (Main Accounts))
item.description: This is the Part 4 of Digital Media Reporting. Click the Links Navigate to https://rpnradio.com. You should be able to see the red-colored band on the header containing the icons of several social media sites.

item.title: Digital Media Reporting (Part 5 - Social Media (Facebook))
item.description: This is Part 5 of Digital Media Reporting. Facebook Business Navigate and Log in to https://business.facebook.com/. You should now see a master-detail page with the current station selected on the left sidebar.

item.title: Digital Media Reporting (Part 6 - Social Media (YouTube))
item.description: Welcome to Part 6 of Digital Media Reporting. YouTube The easiest way to get each stations’ current YouTube subscribers is to search manually BUT the values are abbreviated (e.

item.title: Accounts Administration
item.description: Administration is broad. This will not breakdown all the how-tos of administration. Google is your bestfriend. Intro There are several services the company is subscrbed to for it’s IT and Online platform.

item.title: Account Billing Renewals
item.description: You don’t get stuff for free so this will guide you how to renew recurring subscriptions of the company. Subscribed Services The credentials for the accounts below will be relayed discreetly and privately.
